name: Easier Ground Assault
shortDescription: Removes the offer requirement for ground assault Rano'erek's job. The job will now be available on any remnant planet, ignoring the 5% offer rate and independent of your story progression.
description: Removes the offer requirement for ground assault Rano'erek's job. The job will now be available on any remnant planet, ignoring the 5% offer rate and independent of your story progression.
